name: Cornell Tech
address: 2 West Loop Road, Roosevelt Island, New York, United States
description: Cornell Tech is a technology, business, law, and design campus of Cornell University located on Roosevelt Island in Manhattan, New York City. It includes the Jacobs Technion-Cornell Institute, a joint academic venture between Cornell and the Technion â€“ Israel Institute of Technology.

name: New York University
address: 345 East 24th Street, New York City, NY, United States
description: New York University (NYU) is a private research university in New York City. Chartered in 1831 by the New York State Legislature,[14] NYU was founded by a group of New Yorkers led by then-Secretary of the Treasury Albert Gallatin.

name: Columbia University
address: 630 W. 168th St. New York, NY, United States
description: Columbia University (also known as Columbia, and officially as Columbia University in the City of New York) is a private research university in New York City. Established in 1754 as King's College on the grounds of Trinity Church in Manhattan, Columbia is the oldest institution of higher education in New York and the fifth-oldest institution of higher learning in the United States.
